property.name: storm.zookeeper.servers
property.description: ZookeeperServer, comma-separated list, this MUST be the complete list of zookeeper servers, their fqdn, for a single node setup that will be localhost

property.name: storm.zookeeper.port
property.description: The port Storm will use to connect to each of the ZooKeeper servers.

property.name: nimbus.host
property.description: This configuration parameter, MUST match the fqdn of the server where you want nimbus to be installed. If it's a single-node-setup, you could put localhost here

property.name: drpc.servers
property.description: This configuration parameter, MUST match the fqdn of the server(s) where you have the drpc installed. If it's a single-node-setup, you could put localhost here

property.name: nimbus.childopts
property.description: This parameter is used by the storm-deploy project to configure the jvm options for the nimbus daemon.

property.name: ui.port
property.description: Storm UI binds to this port.

property.name: ui.childopts
property.description: Childopts for Storm UI Java process.

property.name: supervisor.slots.ports
property.description: A list of ports that can run workers on this supervisor. Each worker uses one port, and the supervisor will only run one worker per port. Use this configuration to tune how many workers run on each machine.

property.name: supervisor.childopts
property.description: This parameter is used by the storm-deploy project to configure the jvm options for the supervisor daemon.

property.name: worker.childopts
property.description: The jvm opts provided to workers launched by this supervisor. All \"%ID%\" substrings are replaced with an identifier for this worker.

property.name: drpc.childopts
property.description: The jvm opts provided to workers launched by this supervisor. All \"%ID%\" substrings are replaced with an identifier for this worker.
